mapper.insert: insert into inqu (inqu_title, inqu_question, inqu_create_date, img, writer) values (#{inqu_title}, #{inqu_question}, NOW(), #{img}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update inqu set inqu_title=#{inqu_title}, inqu_question=#{inqu_question}, img=#{img}, inqu_create_date=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where inqu_id=#{inqu_id}
mapper.select: select * from inqu where inqu_id = #{inqu_id} and inqu_title = #{inqu_title}
